timeline.message: be the null-toleration you want to see in the world

timeline.bodyText: stream/foreach also works fine, if you prefer
timeline.author: jmthibault79

replies.bodyText: FWIW It occurred to me over the weekend that maybe we could have just left the null values out of the row maps and kept the old structure. Just .filter(Objects::nonNull). No need to change it now.
replies.author: jaycarlton

timeline.bodyText: Please use a fixed instant (e.g. with Instant.parse("")) so we don't have changing behavior between runs.
timeline.author: jaycarlton

timeline.bodyText: FWIW I will probably eventually make the snapshot timestamp and individual wannabe PK columns required in BQ, but this is fine for now.
timeline.author: jaycarlton

timeline.bodyText: slightly out of scope, but it would be good to test both upload methods with a completely empty snapshot or snapshot with one table empty. We can either throw an IllegalArgumentException or treat it as valid (e.g. for brand-new environments).
timeline.author: jaycarlton

timeline.message: fixed snapshot time and empty snapshot tests
